tracks.title: We Rise!
tracks.story_hook: Papito salutes every soul who rises at dawn to chase purpose.
tracks.gratitude_focus: Thanks to the ancestors and community mentors.
tracks.empowerment_focus: Remind listeners they carry generational brilliance.
hook_lyrics: We rise, we rise, value in our veins
Blessings overflow, dancing through the rains

tracks.title: Bless Me with Sense
tracks.story_hook: A mid-tempo prayer for clarity in a noisy world.
tracks.empowerment_focus: Choose wisdom over rush, alignment over hype.
hook_lyrics: Bless me with sense, with balance and peace
Guide every step till my spirit is free

tracks.title: Wealth Beyond Money
tracks.story_hook: Celebrating freedom found in wisdom, love, and service.
tracks.gratitude_focus: Give thanks for health, community, and discipline.
tracks.empowerment_focus: Redefine wealth as impact, joy, and spiritual alignment.
hook_lyrics: Wealth beyond money, spread love through the land
Joy in the spirit, value in our hands

promotional_beats: Daily gratitude livestream with fan rollcall.
Behind-the-scenes IG Reels highlighting studio sessions.
